post.author: 3didy
post.body:
Hi
i'm an indie musician struggling to make my own music vdo
i'm xperienced in 3d max for some time,doing animation,bullettime
but when it comes to scene,my computer can't handle render the whole thing well( fire,lights,particles )
So i take a stepback and look at gamemaking,i wonder if i can use scene of some game in my vdo.
The low polygon of game asset still look great especially Doom
any infos? thnx

post.author: Lumpengnom
post.body:
3didy wrote:
Hi
but when it comes to scene,my computer can't handle render the whole thing well( fire,lights,particles )

Render in several passes and combine them afterwards with some sort of compositing software like Autodesk Combustion, Adobe After Effects or Avid Media Composer.

<edit>Or get some more RAM.</edit>
